lore: Taliyah is a nomadic mage from Shurima, torn between teenage wonder and adult responsibility. She has crossed nearly all of Valoran on a journey to learn the true nature of her growing powers, though more recently she has returned to protect her tribe. Some have mistaken her compassion for weakness and paid the ultimate priceâ€”for beneath Taliyah's youthful demeanor is a will strong enough to move mountains, and a spirit fierce enough to make the earth itself tremble.
title: the Stoneweaver
blurb: Taliyah is a nomadic mage from Shurima, torn between teenage wonder and adult responsibility. She has crossed nearly all of Valoran on a journey to learn the true nature of her growing powers, though more recently she has returned to protect her tribe...
allytips: Try to throw enemies into Unraveled Earth using Seismic Shove.
Remember, you don't always have to ride Weaver's Wall.
Once you have Rylai's Crystal Scepter, casting Threaded Volley at enemies chasing you is a great way of making them regret everything.

passive.name: Rock Surfing
passive.description: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.

enemytips: When Taliyah casts Unraveled Earth in the lane, be on the lookout for Seismic Shove. If she throws you into her minefield, the throws and stones will break your bones.
Taliyah's Threaded Volley is locked into a direction. If she's throwing rocks at you, dodge to the side!
name: Taliyah

spells.name: Threaded Volley
spells.description: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
spells.tooltip:
Hurls 5 rocks in a direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area around the first enemy hit. Subsequent hits on the same unit deal {{ e2 }}% reduced damage. Creates Worked Ground for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Taliyah gains {{ f2 }}% movement speed on Worked Ground. Casting Threaded Volley on Worked Ground only hurls one rock but refunds {{ e7 }}% of its mana cost.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Hurls 5 rocks in a direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area around the first enemy hit. Subsequent hits on the same unit deal {{ e2 }}% reduced damage. Creates Worked Ground for {{ f1 }} seconds. Taliyah gains {{ f2 }}% movement speed on Worked Ground. Casting Threaded Volley on Worked Ground only hurls one rock but refunds {{ e7 }}% of its mana cost.

spells.name: Seismic Shove
spells.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
spells.tooltip:
Taliyah targets an area. After a short delay, enemies caught within the area will be pushed and dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

You can control the direction enemies will be pushed by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Taliyah targets an area. After a short delay, enemies caught within the area will be pushed and dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. You can control the direction enemies will be pushed by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

spells.name: Unraveled Earth
spells.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
spells.tooltip:
Places a field of dash-sensitive traps that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies in the area by {{ f2 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the traps explode, dealing damage again.

Enemies dashing, being pushed, or being pulled through Unraveled Earth will trigger traps, taking {{ f3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage from each trap (maximum 4, each hit after the first deals {{ f4 }}% less damage).
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Places a field of dash-sensitive traps that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies in the area by {{ f2 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the traps explode, dealing damage again. Enemies dashing, being pushed, or being pulled through Unraveled Earth will trigger traps, taking {{ f3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage from each trap (maximum 4, each hit after the first deals {{ f4 }}% less damage).

spells.name: Weaver's Wall
spells.description: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
spells.tooltip:
Cast once to create a wall. Recast immediately to ride ahead of the wall. Moving or receiving damage will cause Taliyah to stop.

Weaver's Wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. Deactivate this spell to break the wall early.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cast once to create a wall. Recast immediately to ride ahead of the wall. Moving or receiving damage will cause Taliyah to stop. Weaver's Wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. Deactivate this spell to break the wall early.
